scripts.test-local-debug: WORKERS=1 PWDEBUG=1 BASE_URL=http://localhost DOMAIN=http://localhost  playwright test --config playwright.localhost.config.ts --project chromium --headed
scripts.test-local: VIDEO=on WORKERS=4 BASE_URL=http://localhost DOMAIN=http://localhost  playwright test --config playwright.localhost.config.ts --project chromium --headed --retries=2
scripts.test-local-mobile: VIDEO=on WORKERS=2 BASE_URL=http://localhost DOMAIN=http://localhost playwright test --config playwright.localhost.config.ts --project MobileChrome --headed
